title: Predictions Notification
custom_preconds: Given: The user's mobile device is turned on
custom_steps:
When the user receives a MLB Rally notification
And the notification reads: "You have predictions to make! Come make your predictions on today's games!
And the user taps the notification
custom_expected:
Then the user sees a Rally Space page
And then sees the "Welcome <User Nickname>
And Choose any..." text
And today's <Day?Date>
And a stack of tiles for today's games

title: Game Start Notification
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has selected a game that has not yet started
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the "Notify" button on the last card of that game
custom_expected:
THEN the button should change color and display "On"
AND the buttons should still say "On" when the user navigates away from that game and then back into it
AND the user should receive a notification when the selected game begins

title: "Enable Notification" button is disabled for games that are final
custom_steps:
1. Wait until the game is final
2. Open the game scroll to 'It's game time!' prop
custom_expected:
When a game has completed, the enable notifications button that is on the card at the end of the pre-game props no longer has a button to enable notifications.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/34115)

title: Notification for active game
custom_preconds: The first inning is about to start
custom_steps: User gets the notification and clicks on it immediately
custom_expected: No props are locked yet and the user is able to make predictions for the first prop

custom_steps_separated.content: Disable notification for Rally in device settings
custom_steps_separated.expected: After clicking on 'Enable Notification' button in pre-game, Notification screen pops up

custom_steps_separated.content: Disable notification on the profile page in the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: After clicking on 'Enable Notification' button in pre-game, 'Notifications are disabled' screen pops up and the user can enable it. If the user enables it, the notification toggle is on on the Profile page

custom_steps_separated.content: If user disables notification for Rally in device settings
custom_steps_separated.expected: The notification toggle is off on Profile page

custom_steps_separated.content: If user's notification for Rally is On
custom_steps_separated.expected: After clicking on 'Enable Notification' button in pre-game, no Notification screen pops up

custom_steps_separated.content: If user turns on notification on pre-game and go to profile page and toggles the notification off
custom_steps_separated.expected: Turning notification off in user’s profile should turn pre-game notification off.

title: Notification on the Games tab
custom_preconds: If the user made predictions and has results to see
custom_expected:
The game will turn blue on the Games tab. It will also have a ! sign on the left with lighter blue bar

![](index.php?/attachments/get/29204)

title: No play notifications
custom_expected:
Information that is not directly related to the pitches that are being thrown or the results of the at-bat should be shown in the Notification Ribbon. Examples include pitching changes, mound visits, manager challenges. These items should still be shown in the pitchcast feed.

![](index.php?/attachments/get/34106)

![](index.php?/attachments/get/34107)

![](index.php?/attachments/get/34108)

custom_steps_separated.expected:
User get the notification immediately after the game is over.


"This game is over!
Final Score: team : @ team : . Come see how well you did!

![](index.php?/attachments/get/34183)

custom_steps_separated.content: User did not play the game
custom_steps_separated.expected: Game is over and user does not get a notification

title: Notification amount
custom_expected: User should receive just one notification for each kind.

custom_steps_separated.content:
1. Turn the notification toggle on
2. Exit the app
3. Go back to the app

1. Turn the notification toggle off
2. Exit the app
3. Go back to the app

title: Introducing Bonus
custom_expected:
On the morning of 9/29, a push notification is sent to every Rally player with the following text:
Title: “Introducing Rally Bonus!”
Body: “Now you can earn bonus points with each correct prediction in Rally. Come check it out!”

title: No notification for no game day
custom_expected: No notification should be sent for the day when games are not scheduled
